para: This command sets the color scheme and widget styles used in the GUI. OOF2 uses the Gtk3 graphics toolkit from Gnome. Gnome themes may be downloaded from various places on the web (search for gtk3 themes). &oof2; will look for themes in various system directories and in the .themes subdirectory in your home directory.

To automatically set the theme for all &oof2; sessions, put this command in the file .oof2rc in your home directory. For example:
OOF.Settings.Theme(theme="HighContrastInverse")
